page.title: 07TARN NEWS, URSWICK, SCALES
page.content: The Tarn News is a locally printed news-sheet, its catchment area covers the parishes of Aldingham,Dendron,and Rampside,and Bardsea and Urswick. Mr.James Tait being rector of the first three parishes and Mr Brian Dawson vicar of the latter two.This news sheet gives the vicars the oppor- tunity to speak to their parishoners. The sheet prints information regarding forth coming events and reports on past ones."News" has to be submitted by the 15th. of each month to Mrs. Bagnall of Dendron or Mrs. Clutton- Brock of Urswick who,type out and set up the sheet. Anyone residing in tke five parishes may submit news. Some examples from the July 1985 edition are set out on the next page. The sheet is sold within the catchment area at 18p per copy,and is delivered by local volunteers.
